name: bellwoods demake
description:
this is a demake of bellwoods by Matt DesLauriers & Mélissa Hernandez

(https://bellwoods.xyz/)

every week, i write about games i played. i didn't really want to write about bellwoods, as it ought to just be experienced, so i just made a game as a sort of ode to it. 

made in DungeonScript by Farbs (based on puzzlescript byincrepare)
